titleStmt.title: The diuell of the vault. Or, The vnmasking of murther in a briefe declaration of the Cacolicke-complotted [sic] treason, lately discouerd: I.H.
titleStmt.author: I. H., fl. 1616.
Heath, John, Fellow of New College, Oxford, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. A[llde] for Nathnaiell [sic] Butter, and are to be solde at his shop neere Paules Churchyard, at Saint Austens Gate,

notesStmt.note: Sometimes doubtfully attributed to John Heath.
Running title reads: The vnmasking of murther.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: his shop neere Paules Churchyard, at Saint Austens Gate
